resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106868</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106868</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206307</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hoover Dam Learning Packet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hooverdamm Erlernenpaket</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paquet D'Étude de Barrage d'Aspirateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pacote De Aprendizagem Da Represa De Hoover</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pacchetto Imparante Della Diga Di Hoover</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πακέτο εκμάθησης φραγμάτων Hoover</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Paquete Que aprende De la Presa De Aspiradora</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">contains learning activities on the impact of Hoover Dam on the environment and its technical and historical significance. Learn about the history, wildlife, water resources, and hydroelectricity of Hoover Dam.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">enthält Lernenaktivitäten auf der Auswirkung des
Hooverdamms auf die Umgebung und seine technische und historische 
Stichhaltigkeit. Erlernen Sie über die Geschichte, die Wildnis,
die Wasserbetriebsmittel und die Hydroelektrizität des Hooverdamms.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">contient l'étude sur l'impact du barrage 
d'aspirateur sur l'environnement et sa signification technique et 
historique. Renseignez-vous sur l'histoire, la faune, les 
ressources d'eau, et l'hydroélectricité du barrage d'aspirateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contem atividades de aprendizagem no impacto da 
represa de hoover no ambiente e em seu significado técnico e 
histórico. Aprenda sobre o history, os animais selvagens, os 
recursos de água, e o hydroelectricity da represa de hoover.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">contiene le attività imparanti sull'effetto della
diga di hoover sull'ambiente e sulla relativa importanza tecnica e 
storica. Impari circa la storia, la fauna selvatica, le risorse 
idriche e l'idroelettricità della diga di hoover.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιέχει τις δραστηριότητες εκμάθησης στον αντίκτυπο 
του φράγματος Hoover στο περιβάλλον και την τεχνική και 
ιστορική σημασία του. Μάθετε για την ιστορία, την άγρια 
φύση, τους υδάτινους πόρους, και τον υδροηλεκτρισμό του φράγματος
Hoover.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">contiene actividades que aprenden en el impacto de
la presa de aspiradora en el ambiente y su significación técnica e 
histórica. Aprenda sobre la historia, la fauna, los recursos de
agua, y la hidroelectricidad de la presa de aspiradora.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206307</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106868</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/hoover-dam-learning-packet</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
